author: Bartosz Golab
comment: Thank you for the fix! 5 stars if google calendar colors could be preserved for respective calendars.

author: Dean Lewis
comment: If the digital watch face didn't crash I'd happily bump up the stars (maybe 5 stars).  I'm not an analogue face user, found another similar all to this that works fine with the digital face.  Would like the option for a pitch black background.

author: Jordan Hogan
comment: Digital mode makes the watch face crash. Also it would be nice to have support for showing calendar appointments as their calendar colour.

author: Ryan V
comment: I've been messing with this app for a little while and I don't know why, but the event I had in my calendar before intalling did not get added to the screen. This event was added through an online link, so I dont know if that is why it wasn't shown on the watch screen or if it was because it was in my calendar before I installed this watch face. I will have to figure that out in a couple of days. I did add some test events however and those did show up on my watch face.
title: Not bad

author: Renbo
comment: Really good, would love more settings though. Like be able to create a circle to the left and right , to display weather and maybe battery.. Also, be able to show the date in ambient mode would be great. Maybe even show the text in the calendar events also in ambient mode. And a stopwatch feature. Than it would be perfect .
title: Great

author: Szasz Bernard
comment: Hello, best ever calendar watch. Even from the one's from the watchmaker database. I would use it on daily basis if it would have a dimmed screen. Just some grey pointers and also the calendar segments in light grey without text to save battery.  Implement this and you get the 5 th star. Regards,

reply.author: Tino Bertram
reply.content: Thank you! I'll include some of your suggestions! :)

title: Echt super!

author: S Astro
comment: l'm glad this shows layered appointments but itdoesn't give the option to choose colours used on my google calendar.
title: Multiple appointments but

author: Rodney Silva
comment: Not installing on Android m preview.
With neat animation, no more options needed really
title: Most useful Calendar

author: Oleg Mazin
comment: Please adjust dial to look well on square watch. Calendars being round are just fine, however having a round dial on a square (rectangular) watch doesn't look good. Brilliant for the round watch though.

reply.author: Tino Bertram
reply.content:
Thank you! We will think about how to make it look better on square watches.
Kind regards.

title: Very nice,but not buying yet

author: Kristopher Dick
comment: It doesn't even show up as an available watch face.

reply.author: Tino Bertram
reply.content: Usually it takes a while to install the watch face. Due to the slow Bluetooth transmission. Sorry for the inconveniences. Kind regards
